CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 17, 1939, pg. 8, reads: "'With A Song In Their Hearts' Lovely June Brides, Handsome Grooms Smile For Courier Cameramen - Pictured above are five of the season's loveliest brides...all of whom exchanged vows with their mates last Saturday, June 10. Upper left are Mr. and Mrs. Morgan Thomas.  She was the former Evelyn Norman, daughter of the John Normans, of Wilkinsburg.  The ceremony was performed in home of the bride's parents at 10 a.m.  The are now honeymooning in Callender, Ontario, home of the famed Dionne quintuplets. - Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Groom Morgan Thomas and bride Evelyn Norman Thomas posed in front of maple branches and mantle, in Norman home, Wilkinsburg
